div.div: This search form uses an instant search feature. As you type, search results will appear automatically below the search field. When you've entered you desired search terms use tab to navigate through the available results and hit enter to open the selected page or document.

div.p:
DISTRICT 8 - TECH HELP Parents and Students... Got Chromebook issues? Password Problems? Connectivity Issues? Please click on the following link: DISTRICT 8 TECH HELP Then follow these steps: 1) You will be prompted to sign in in. Sign in using the student's District 8 Google Email and Password. 2) Select a time slot that works best for you. 3) In the...

Coronavirus (COVID-19) has arrived in North Dakota. WCSD8 is monitoring the situation closely and participating in discussions with Governor Burgum, ND Dept. of Health and ND Dept of Instruction. Communication regarding district actions will be communicated using this page, instant alert (voice and text), the school Facebook pages and local media. Governor...
READ MORE >

WCSD8 Families... Distance Learning begins tomorrow! Please view the following tutorial so that your students are logged in to their Chromebooks correctly.Student Chromebook Login Tutorial

img.alt: Star Reading and Math - Logging in to RenLearn

div.a: Star Reading and Math - Logging in to RenLearn

div.p:
Each month your students will be assessed to measure their progress in math and reading. Please follow your teacher's instructions, and the following tutorial to access the Star Reading and Math testing through Renaissance Learning.Parents/guardians it is really important that students do the tests on their own. Please resist the urge to help your child. If they...

District 8 Family, We will be distributing materials for Distance Learning on Monday, March 30th and Tuesday, March 31st.
Curbside pick-up of educational materials (including Chromebooks and personal items left by students) will be at all three District 8 Schools according to the following scheduleâ€¦

Most stops will occur between 9:15 and 10:30am. Click Here for Specific Locations and Times Meals may also be picked up at Missouri Ridge between 9:30-10:00 am. School employees will be at each site to help with distribution. Students need to pick up food (this is a federal rule) Students will receive a lunch in one bag, a breakfast for the following morning,...

div.a: How to Talk to Kids About COVID-19

div.p:

The Hawk's 9-12 Task Force has been exploring several calendar options for next year. A very brief survey that was sent home with elementary students suggests moving to a four day school week for next year would be premature. The WCSD8 School Board was presented this calendar at last night's board meeting. A decision regarding the calendar will likely be made at...
READ MORE >

Kindergarten Registration begins on January 27th! Click on PARENT AND STUDENT RESOURCES for registration forms.

District 8
111 7th Avenue West
Williston, ND 58801
Phone: 701-572-6359
Fax: 701-572-9311

Williams County Public Schools provides equal opportunity in its programs, activities, and employment. If you cannot fully access the information on any web page of this site, please let us know the accessibility issue you are having by contacting Steve Guglich, Technology Director, at (701) 572-6359 or by e-mail at steven.guglich@k12.nd.us. We will try to provide the information to you in an alternate format and/or make the necessary improvements to make the information accessible. If you would like to file a formal grievance under Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act or Title II of the Americans with Disabilities Act, you may contact our Section 504/Title II coordinator, Nerida Reichman, at 111 7th Avenue West, Williston, ND 58801, at (701) 572-6359, or by e-mail at nerida.reichman1@k12.nd.us.
